mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EVENEMENT (EvenementID, Evenement_Nom, Evenement_Date, Evenement_Debut, Evenement_Fin, Asso_EtudianteID, Nombre_Places, Allow_Guests, Description) VALUES (#{eventId}, #{eventName}, #{eventDate}, #{eventStart}, #{eventEnd}, #{studentAssociationId}, #{eventPlaces}, #{allowGuests}, #{eventDescription})
